title: High Financial Services Score
description: In 2024, Cambodia achieved a high score of 86.03 in the B-READY Financial Services Overall Score, indicating strong performance in this sector.

title: Strong Debt Policy Rating
description: In 2023, Cambodia received a CPIA debt policy rating of 5, suggesting a robust approach to managing debt.

title: High Women's Decision-Making Participation
description: In 2022, 87.8% of Cambodian women aged 15-49 participated in major decision-making areas such as health care, household purchases, and visiting family.

title: Low Medium and High-Tech Manufacturing
description: In 2022, only 0.26% of Cambodia's manufacturing value added came from medium and high-tech manufacturing, indicating a low level of technological advancement in this sector.

title: Minimal Fuel Exports
description: In 2022, fuel exports constituted a mere 0.00000339% of Cambodia's merchandise exports, reflecting a negligible contribution from this sector.
